headline: Police Officer Killed in Atlanta Shooting Near CDC
summary: A police officer was killed while responding to a shooting near the Atlanta campus of the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention, authorities said Friday.  Officers responded to reports of an active shooter at a CVS pharmacy on the edge of the CDC’s campus at roughly 4:50 p.m. Eastern time, Atlanta Police Department Chief Darin Schierbaum said at a press conference.  There, they found a critically injured officer from DeKalb County.
